title: ahri and ivern interaction
body: does anyone else think Ahri and Ivern should have a special interaction with each other? because Ahri was a fox and Ivern cares for flora and fauna doesn't he?

replies.body:
Anivia is a bird
Maokai is a tree
Nidalee is a cougar 
Theres lots of flora and fauna champs.

Plus probably cares less about animals that are now people.

If anything, i reckon Pop-star Ahri should make Daisy dance.
